column5: The ENVS Master of Science program provides advanced training in a setting that prioritizes cross-disciplinary perspectives and problem-oriented scholarship. Our goal is to deliver the knowledge and skills needed to confront 21st century environmental challenges. MS students complete coursework that spans the natural and social sciences, values and ethics, and policy. Students gain specialized research skills by writing and defending an original master’s thesis. Learning Outcomes  Among the knowledge and skills that we seek to provide to every student are:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
